Sure! In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Disease":

1. Phenylalanine hydroxylase deficiency: This is the disease that is being studied in the paragraph, which is a genetic disorder caused by mutations in the PAH gene.
2. Metabolic phenotype: This refers to the set of symptoms and characteristics that an individual with a particular genetic disorder exhibits, in this case, phenylalanine hydroxylase deficiency.
